title: What could cause massive FPS drops?
body: Hello guys, I have a problem since the last patch update. My PC is medicore, it's not bad at all but I am getting MASSIVE FPS drops. Usually I have about 89-95 FPS but it just drops to 09 it lasts dor a few seconds and than rises back to ~80 and it drops all over again so I can barely play a game. I had no problems before the last patch update tho. Anyone facing similar problems?

replies.body: You may have outdated drivers causing your frames to drop, or something else entirely.  Go over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide  for a list of troubleshoot steps to get this fixed up.  Hopefully, it'll be smooth sailing from there!
Okey ty so much, I'll take a look. :)
